subject: Newbie - Kindly help
msgSnippet: Hi How does one test the functionality of Web-sites,like Submit buttons ? When I do a submit,I want to make sure that the next page is displayed correctly.
messageBody:
Hi

When I do a submit,I want to make sure that the next page is
displayed correctly.
